title: API Gateway High Latency
description: API response times exceeding 2s threshold. Affecting 15% of requests.

title: Database Primary Failover
description: Primary database node failed, automatic failover to replica completed.
resolution: Investigated root cause as disk failure. Replaced node and rejoined to cluster.

title: Suspicious Login Attempts Detected
description: Multiple failed login attempts from unusual IPs. Possible credential stuffing attack.
